profile.name: Raúl
profile.title: Project Leader - E2E international project leadership. Interact at all levels, technical and political. Architect | Agile Lead | Project Manager | Devops | Mobile / Cloud
profile.description:
More than 24 years of experience holding positions in all phases of software development projects. In companies like Microsoft, Citrix, Capgemini, and Cognizant as well as being Co-founder of two Start-ups. Holding technical, management and customer relational positions. This experience allows him to understand projects globally, identifying dependencies, anticipating and avoid problems, and detecting areas of improvement.

Sales, analysis, design, planning, development, testing (QA), deployment, support, continuous improvement; as architect, Technical Lead (TL), developer, mobile, back, Agile Coach, Scrum Master (SM), SRE, Project Manager (PM), Presale.

Leading teams of up to 30 people. Managing projects of several million euros. All using agile methodologies, distributed and international.
Without losing his political and commercial vision of the projects, Raúl is looking for a position that allow him to apply new technologies and service to international clients.

Raúl defines himself as a father, an optimist, an idealist, an engineer, a bit of a philosopher, a strategist, passionate about understanding and learning from everyone. With the goal of leaving a better world that we found it making a difference on the people we crossroads with on the way.

interestingFacts.fact: Leo and Noa are his main motivation, to work every day to become a better person living behind a better world than what we were given.

roles.name: Mobile Cloud Architect / Agile Lead / Project Manager
